trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 類型公開至 UI 自動化。

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 與這個自動化對等相關聯的項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An object that is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，位於與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 與指定之項目相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" /> 的子項目集合。
這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" /> 的子項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" /> 的類別名稱。
這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupAutomationPeer" /> 的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 指定控制項模式的值列舉。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> 值，則為支援控制項模式的物件，否則為 <see langword="null" />。
